title: more time to do runes
body:
50 seconds
im sick and tired of doing runes, especially with the new system with the stats. i mean 30 seconds. it’s ridiculous

replies.body:
I have 2 pages (Not including the presets), no matter what pick i'm in, i manage to get it done in 15 seconds, how do you struggle.

Change the setting in the bottom left corner to the multi-view (it will appear as circles, instead of having to individually search)
then a few clicks and you're done, i don't see the problem, just pay attention to your screen

If you are too lazy to do this, buy a couple more pages

You have before you even queue up, time to make premade pages.

You also have the entire champ select to choose what you want to take.

Granted last pick does get less time to alter their page according to the matchup, but its literally 3 clicks. You just ave to be actively paying attention during the whole champ select and think what your runes will be rather then just when its your turn.

I have 13 pages (from before the major rune overhaul), so this has never been an issue for me.

Perhaps buy a couple more pages to make it easier for yourself? BE is free after all.
i mean i have 11 and have been using only for like 2 years now i don see the problem unless you just ain't looking at your screen for some reason
